<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.54</value></part><part><name>Game Version (number surrounded by NO SPACES)</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value> ("local" or "global")

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value> ("local" or "global")

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name/>=<value> Multiplayer Execution ("server" or empty)

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Stamina System </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns aimPrecision from animation state with custom value that will directly affects weapon sway size and speed. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getCustomAimCoef''' unit </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> _coef = '''getCustomAimCoef''' player </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Arma 3 Stamina]] [[setCustomAimCoef]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
